data_source: Publicly available operator disclosures and constellation summaries
purpose: Curated operator watchlist for monitoring large-scale orbital population trends. This list is informational and non-predictive.

operators.notes: Largest active LEO constellation. High deployment cadence and rapid replenishment cycles make this operator relevant for population pressure and debris-mitigation transparency analysis.
Medium-to-large LEO constellation with structured deployment phases. Useful comparison case for disposal practices and long-term orbital persistence.

disclaimer: Inclusion in this watchlist does not imply elevated risk or non-compliance. The watchlist exists to support transparency, longitudinal analysis, and public discussion of orbital population dynamics.
